title: Room needed 29.12 for a few hours
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


We are two adults who want to spend some time together tomorrow. Anywhere in zones 1-2 will do. Room size isn't an issue, as long as it has a bed, and ideally access to an ensuite bathroom. Not looking for people to socialize/be intimate with, just lodging. 

Get in touch to discuss.
